title: Scotts Lawn Care Plan for Small Yards (Southern)

description: This Scotts Lawn Care Plan, for use on St. Augustinegrass (including Floratam), centipede, zoysia and carpetgrass lawns, is a four part program with a result of having your home surrounded by a thick, green lawn all-year long. From controlling weeds to feeding your lawn throughout the year, each season you'll have the product you need to turn a so-so lawn into a kick-off-your-shoes lawn the whole family can enjoy. With the Scotts Lawn Care Plan, you can get the yard you want all season long, delivered right to your door.
